'''Daniel Govar''' has created numerous [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired illustrations. He also co-founded and illustrated  the website [https://web.archive.org/web/20060202005148/http://www.thereandbackagain.net/ There And Back Again], a Lord of the Rings site dedicated to visualizing the world created by J.R.R. Tolkien. (no longer available).<ref>[https://www.danielgovar.com/about]</ref>

He holds a degree in Imaging and Digital Art from UMBC with an emphasis on interactivity, animation, traditional film, and illustration.
